name: Paragon (itch)
description:
Trailer + Screenshots ->

-- Paragon is now 100% free!! --

Paragon is a game about navigating your ball around mazes, collecting shiny things, and narrowly escaping deadly spikes.

Jump off of magnetic rails with precise timing and your ball will bounce around the maze gathering treasures, until landing on another rail.

Try not to stay on one rail for too long, the less you bounce off the walls while on a rail, the better your score!

  • Features 20+ levels of unique precision bouncing action!
  • A wicked industrial-electronic soundtrack that evolves as you progress through each level!
  • Unlockable mods based on indie games by Sophie Houlden, Nifflas, and chuchino!
  • Bonus expert levels to put your skills to the test!


Check out Paragon's soundtrack here, created by Ex Machinae
